titles.title: Lord, Dismiss Us with Thy Blessing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, dismiss us with Thy blessing; Fill our hearts with joy and peace; Let us each, Thy love possessing, Triumph in redeeming grace: O refresh us, O refresh us, Traveling through this wilderness.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thanks we give and adoration For Thy gospel's joyful sound; May the fruits of Thy salvation In our hearts and lives abound: Ever faithful, Ever faithful To the truth may we be found.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So that when Thy love hall call us, Savior, from the world away, Let no fear of death appall us, Glad Thy summons to obey: May we ever, May we ever Reign with Thee in endless day. Amen.
